title: Clever Books
description: Developed as part of an assignment, Clever Book Site is a web application designed to provide users with a seamless experience in discovering and managing their book collections

title: Fire detection system using CCTV Surveillance Camera
description: Developed a real-time fire detection and alert system using OpenCV and Twilio API, featuring cascade model integration and immediate, customizable notifications.

title: Employee Management System (MERN Stack)
description: A streamlined app for managing employees—add, view, edit, delete—featuring a smooth UI with React and an efficient backend with Node.js.

title: Vishwapreneur'24 Event Website
description: Developed the official event website for Vishwapreneur '24, utilizing React to create a dynamic and engaging platform for Pune's premier entrepreneurship event.
